alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 4:35PM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Snow accumulations 4 to 8 inches above 5,500 feet. Total snow 1 to 4 inches from 4,500 feet to 5,500 feet. Snow accumulations 1 inch or less from 3,000 feet to 4,500 feet. Winds will gust as high as 55 mph on exposed ridgetops. * WHERE...The Kern County mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult and hazardous due to snow accumulating on roadways and possible road closures. Visibility may be reduced in patchy blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a 41 percent chance of at least 1 inch of snow along the Grapevine over Tejon Pass.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
